page.title: 05The Taxi & the Ice Cream Man
page.content:
My Dad is a taxi driver and soon he is going to take someone to a wedding. Sometimes he goes to Southwold and he has been to London over 10 times since he has had his business and he has been to Heathrow Airport over five times. He has got one car and four people can fit in it. Matthew Hanford
My Dad works as an ice-cream man. The depot is at Pakefield near Lowestoft. He sells Walls' Ice-cream. He goes around Wrentham, Southwold, Reydon, Kessingland and LOwestoft. On Sundays he goes round the country. My Dad knows some more ice-cream men. Heidi Hodgkins
